      • addTilesToHand

        public void addTilesToHand(java.util.List<Tile> tiles)
        Adds a number of tiles to the player's hand. Fails if the player would have too many tiles in their hand after this operation. Sorts the hand afterwards.
        Overrides:
        addTilesToHand in class Player
        Parameters:
        tiles - Tiles to add to the player's hand.
